original_title: 2 Stroke Cold Smoke 14: Life’s Short Go Big
overview: This adventure snowmobile film takes the viewers into the famed steep and deep North American Mountains. The record deep powder days have the sledders hammering the throttle like never before. Pro riders slash, whip, climb, drop and crash making this film inspiring and gut-wrenching to watch.
title: 2 Stroke Cold Smoke 14: Life’s Short Go Big
